submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        cnt = Counter()
        mx = []
        for i in range(n // 2):
            a = nums[i]
            b = nums[n - 1 - i]
            mx.append(max(a , b , k - a , k - b))
            cnt[abs(a - b)] += 1
        ans = n
        ct = 0
        cnt_mx = Counter(mx)
        for i in range(k + 1):
            ans = min(ans , n // 2 - cnt[i] + (ct))
            ct += cnt_mx[i]
        # print(ans)
        # print(mx)
        # print(cnt)
        return ans
